remarks: The value of set exponentiation (inference version). ` ( A ^m B ) ` is the set of all functions that map from ` B ` to ` A ` .  Definition 10.24 of [Kunen] p. 24.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2003.)
statement:
mapval.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
mapval.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
mapval $p |- ( A ^m B ) = { f | f : B --> A } $.
$d A f $.
$d B f $.
